Segment.name: Y1
Segment.comment: To specify information used to make a reservation for space on an ocean vessel

Field.name: SailingFlightDateEstimated
Field.comment: Date for reservation expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: TariffServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the types of services for rating purposes

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time
